list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Asynchronous execution of Local Command. Add Working Dir settting to the configuration.

task.summary: Default task
More doc.
Start working on the configuration for the actions. Add SnakeYAML as dependency of the project.
Capable to load the YAML dispatcher configuration. Clean up the YAML format.
Parse the YAML config with custom types.
New configuration/topics method to list configured topics of interest.
List messages per topic.
Optimize imports.
Make the name required. Manage empty topic name.
Use a dedicate access class to browse the configuration.
Add dispatch method.
Extend documentation in the README.
Tweake some responses. Rename dispatcher/topic to dispatcher/messages.
More doc.
Tweak YAML in the README>
Tweak doc.
Introduce and manage the ${payload] placeholder in the triggers.
Parse the configuration in the PostConstruct step.
Error handling of invalid messages and topics.
Add draft kafka configuration.
Change the configuration format. Remove the messages and add list of triggers for each action. Also add a reply message for each trigger.
Remove critical vulnerability in jackson.core.
Rename consumer, remove the publisher code.
Add link to Spring-kafka.
Read consumer group from the configuration.
Complete DConsumer and DProducer implementation. Add test with an embedded kafka broker to test the application.
Simplify the Sender/Receiver pattern. Refactor packages. Fix the Spring-kafka test.
Make topics of interest configurable.
Restore tomcat start up.
Configure the receiver as a batch listener.
Autowire configuration. Topic management (in progress).
Add custom conf section to README.
More doc on custom configuration.
Autowire TopicConfigurations (in progress).
Remove previous config classes (all autowired now).
Tweak log configuration.
Autowire sender/receiver in the controller instead of the app.
Enable autocommit.
Remove obsolete info from README.
Preliminary work on Executors.
Change the receiver to get json-serialized payloads.
Simplify the Executor interface.
New signature for publish method. It accepts now an open list of parameters to convert to a JSON payload.
Tweak documentation and logs.
Pretty printing of json and set placeholders.
Replace placeholders in the trigger with their actual value.
Update doc.
Update doc.
Adapt test cases to the Sender/Receiver with an open list of parameters.
Asynchronous execution of Local Command. Add Working Dir settting to the configuration.

option.value: Asynchronous execution of Local Command. Add Working Dir settting to the configuration.
